info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:49PM CDT until July 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG AND SOUTHWESTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 749 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Vigo Park, or 20 miles north of Silverton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Howardwick and Greenbelt Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
